mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( user_id, username, password, salt, phone, avatar, dept_id, create_time, update_time, lock_flag, del_flag, wx_openid, qq_openid, tenant_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{phone}, #{avatar}, #{deptId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{lockFlag}, #{delFlag}, #{wxOpenid}, #{qqOpenid}, #{tenantId} );
